items.name: The Canvas Gallery & Bistro
items.short_description: A vibrant hub showcasing contemporary Nigerian art, paired with a stylish bistro offering local and international cuisine. It's a perfect blend of culture and culinary delight, fostering Owerri's creative scene.

items.name: Nexus VR Arcade & Lounge
items.short_description: Dive into immersive virtual reality worlds with cutting-edge headsets and a wide array of games, from thrilling adventures to mind-bending puzzles. Afterwards, relax with friends in the futuristic lounge area.

items.name: The Ember & Vine Restaurant
items.short_description: Experience modern fine dining with an Afro-fusion menu crafted by renowned chefs, using locally sourced ingredients. Its elegant ambiance makes it ideal for special occasions and sophisticated palates.
items.address: Plot 7, New Owerri Extension, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Palm City Funland
items.short_description: A vibrant mini-amusement park offering thrilling rides, interactive games, and delightful food stalls for all ages. Perfect for family outings and creating lasting memories in a safe, fun environment.
items.address: Opposite World Bank Housing Estate, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: CinePulse Premium Cinemas
items.short_description: Indulge in a luxurious movie-watching experience with plush reclining seats, state-of-the-art sound, and a gourmet snack bar. Redefining cinema in Owerri with comfort and technology.

items.name: The Hub: Co-working & Coffee
items.short_description: A modern co-working space designed for productivity and collaboration, featuring high-speed internet, ergonomic desks, and a specialty coffee shop serving fresh brews and light bites. Ideal for remote workers and entrepreneurs.

items.name: Owerri Urban Skate Park
items.short_description: A professionally designed concrete skate park attracting skateboarders and BMX riders from across the region. Features ramps, rails, and a vibrant youth culture, offering lessons and events.
items.address: Beside Nekede Road Sports Complex, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Aqua Sky Rooftop Lounge
items.short_description: Perched atop one of Owerri's tallest buildings, offering panoramic city views, bespoke cocktails, and a chic atmosphere for an unforgettable evening out. Perfect for unwinding after a long day.
items.address: Top Floor, Genesis Towers, Control Post, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Serene Oasis Wellness & Spa
items.short_description: A tranquil escape dedicated to holistic well-being, offering massages, facials, hydrotherapy, and meditation gardens. Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul with expert therapists.
items.address: 4 Harmony Gardens, Ikenegbu Extension, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Owerri Culinary Market
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor market showcasing a diverse range of local and international street food vendors, artisanal products, and regular live cooking demonstrations. A feast for all senses and tastes.
items.address: Egbu Road Junction, Adjacent to Shoprite, Owerri, Imo State
